access: A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Serrating](/Equipment.aspx?ID=519)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a slashing melee weapon

</row>

**Access** A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _serrating_ weapon’s bladed edge separates into jagged, swirling shards that spin along the blade. When dealing slashing damage, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage.

<document level="2" id="action-329" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
